name: Firestarter (itch) (PnDAA)
description:
Description

A disease contaminated trees in the forest. As the driver of a customized fire engine, your mission is to burn the sick trees to slow the propagation of the illness down. Spray water on healthy trees if they happen to catch on fire.

Controls

Left/right click: drive toward mouse pointer

When the engine is close to the mouse:

  • left click: activate flamethrower
  • right click: spray water
